description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pilot your ship and it's energy weapon independently as you blast through hyperspace! EchoSpace is a top down "shooter" which requires skill and determination. Controlling two objects at one time is difficult, but very rewarding. You've never played anything quite like it!
